oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of crown-based sulfones via Rongalite: Diversity-oriented approach to annulated benzocrowns by Diels-Alder reactions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
KASHINATH, D
KHEDKAR, P
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: amino-acid derivatives
sodium formaldehyde sulfoxylate
cross-coupling reaction
membrane electrodes
dibenzyl sulfones
organic-reactions
one-step
ethers
calixarenes
cyclophanes
benzocrown ethers
benzoannulation
chromophores
sulfones
diels-alder reaction
diversity oriented synthesis
rongalite
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Benzocrown ether compounds containing a sulfone moiety have been prepared using Rongalite. The resulting sulfones were employed as diene equivalents (o-quinodimethane) for the synthesis of various annulated benzocrown ethers using the Diels-Alder strategy.
